entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Jovite 3:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
